CQ-E1.text:
What kind of event was [Event]?
[Beat] ['Context Setup', 'Historical Hook']
CQ-E1.sparql:
PREFIX ex: <http://wembrewind.live/ex#>
PREFIX schema: <http://schema.org/>
PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
PREFIX skos: <http://www.w3.org/2004/02/skos/core#>
PREFIX oa: <http://www.w3.org/ns/oa#>
PREFIX dct: <http://purl.org/dc/terms/>
SELECT ?eventName ?text ?url
WHERE {
    BIND ({event} AS ?event)
    ?annotation a oa:Annotation ;
           dct:subject ex:Background ;
           oa:hasTarget ?event ;
           oa:hasBody ?background .
    ?background schema:citation ?url .
    ?background schema:description ?text .
    ?event schema:name ?eventName .
}
CQ-E1.question: What kind of event was [Event]?
CQ-E1.answer: [Event] was a global benefit concert held to raise funds for humanitarian relief.

CQ-E2.sparql:

PREFIX dct: <http://purl.org/dc/terms/>
SELECT ?eventName ?text ?url

    BIND ({event} AS ?event)
    ?annotation a oa:Annotation ;
           dct:subject ex:Background ;
           oa:hasTarget ?event ;
           oa:hasBody ?background .
    ?background schema:citation ?url .
    ?background schema:description ?text .
    ?event schema:name ?eventName .
}
CQ-E2.question: Why was [Event] organized?
CQ-E2.answer: [Event] was organized to raise funds for famine relief in Ethiopia.

CQ-E4.sparql:
PREFIX ex: <http://wembrewind.live/ex#>
PREFIX schema: <http://schema.org/>

           dct:subject ex:Performances ;
           oa:hasTarget ?event ;
           oa:hasBody ?background .
    ?background schema:citation ?url .
    ?event schema:name ?eventName .
}

CQ-E7.text:
What role did television and media coverage play in [Event]?
[Beat] ['Context Setup', 'Historical Hook']
CQ-E7.sparql:
PREFIX ex: <http://wembrewind.live/ex#>
PREFIX schema: <http://schema.org/>
PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>

SELECT ?eventName ?text ?url
WHERE {
    BIND ({event} AS ?event)
    ?annotation a oa:Annotation ;
           dct:subject ex:Broadcasts ;
           oa:hasTarget ?event ;

    ?broadcast schema:citation ?url .
    ?broadcast schema:description ?text .
    ?event schema:name ?eventName .

CQ-E10.text:
Which song did [MusicGroup] perform at [Event]?
[Beat] ['Performance Detail', 'Cultural Impact', 'Behind the Scenes']
CQ-E10.sparql:
PREFIX ex: <http://wembrewind.live/ex#>
PREFIX schema: <http://schema.org/>
PREFIX mm: <https://w3id.org/polifonia/ontology/music-meta/>
SELECT (GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT ?workName; separator=", ") AS ?allWorkName)
WHERE {
    ?performance a mm:LivePerformance ;
                 schema:isPartOf ?event ;
    			 ex:isIconic ?isIconic .
    ?performance mm:performedWork ?work .
    ?performance schema:performer ?artist .
    ?work schema:name ?workName .
    FILTER(?event =   {event})
    FILTER(?artist = {musicgroup})
}
CQ-E10.question: Which song did [MusicGroup] perform at [Event]?
CQ-E10.answer: [MusicGroup] performed a medley including [Song1], [Song2], and [Song3] at [Event].

CQ-E14.text:
Who were the solo artists that performed at [Event]?
[Beat] ['Performance Detail', 'Cultural Impact', 'Behind the Scenes']
CQ-E14.sparql:
PREFIX ex: <http://wembrewind.live/ex#>
PREFIX schema: <http://schema.org/>
PREFIX mm: <https://w3id.org/polifonia/ontology/music-meta/>
SELECT DISTINCT ?eventName (GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT ?artistName; separator=", ") AS ?allPerformingArtists)
WHERE {
    ?performance a schema:Event, mm:LivePerformance ;
           schema:isPartOf ?event ;
           schema:performer ?artist .
    ?event schema:name ?eventName .
    ?artist a schema:Person .
    ?artist schema:name ?artistName .
    FILTER(?event =   {event})
}
GROUP BY ?eventName
CQ-E14.question: Who were the solo artists that performed at [Event]?
CQ-E14.answer: Solo artists who performed at [Event] included [Artist1], [Artist2], and [Artist3].

CQ-E17.text:
What were the challenges in organizing [Event]?
[Beat] ['Performance Detail', 'Cultural Impact', 'Behind the Scenes']
CQ-E17.sparql:
PREFIX ex: <http://wembrewind.live/ex#>
PREFIX schema: <http://schema.org/>
PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
PREFIX skos: <http://www.w3.org/2004/02/skos/core#>
PREFIX oa: <http://www.w3.org/ns/oa#>
PREFIX dct: <http://purl.org/dc/terms/>
SELECT ?eventName ?challengeText ?challengeUrl
WHERE {
    BIND ({event} AS ?event)
    ?annotation a oa:Annotation ;
           dct:subject ex:Challenge ;
           oa:hasTarget ?event ;
           oa:hasBody ?challenge .
    ?challenge schema:citation ?challengeUrl .
    ?challenge schema:description ?challengeText .
    ?event schema:name ?eventName .
}
CQ-E17.question: What were the challenges in organizing [Event]?
CQ-E17.answer: Coordinating two venues, artist schedules, and live global broadcasts presented logistical and technical challenges.

    ?annotation a oa:Annotation ;

CQ-E21.question: Which organization archived the broadcast of [Event]?

CQ-E22.text:
Which organization failed to archive the broadcast of [Event]?
[Beat] ['Legacy & Reflection', 'Audience Interaction']
CQ-E22.sparql:
PREFIX ex: <http://wembrewind.live/ex#>
PREFIX schema: <http://schema.org/>
PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
PREFIX mm: <https://w3id.org/polifonia/ontology/music-meta/>
SELECT ?eventName ?subBroadcastDescription ?broadcastCompanyName ?preserved
WHERE {
    BIND (  {event} as ?mainEvent)
    ?mainEvent schema:name ?eventName .
    ?mainEvent ex:hadBroadcast ?mainBroadcast .
    ?mainBroadcast schema:subEvent ?subBroadcast .
    ?subBroadcast schema:description ?subBroadcastDescription .
    ?subBroadcast schema:provider ?broadcastCompany .
    ?subBroadcast ex:wasBroadcastPreserved ?preserved .
    OPTIONAL { ?broadcastCompany schema:name ?broadcastCompanyName }
    OPTIONAL { ?broadcastCompany rdfs:label ?broadcastCompanyName }
    FILTER(?preserved = false)
}
ORDER BY DESC(?preserved)
CQ-E22.question: Which organization failed to archive the broadcast of [Event]?
CQ-E22.answer: Organization did not preserve the Philadelphia broadcast of [Event].

SELECT ?artistName ?reason ?url

CQ-E24.answer: [MusicGroup]’s performance at [Event] is widely praised for its energy, crowd engagement, and cultural impact.

CQ-E27.text:
What creative milestones defined [MusicGroup]’s career before and after [Event]?

CQ-E27.sparql:
PREFIX ex: <http://wembrewind.live/ex#>

PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
PREFIX skos: <http://www.w3.org/2004/02/skos/core#>
PREFIX oa: <http://www.w3.org/ns/oa#>
PREFIX dct: <http://purl.org/dc/terms/>
SELECT ?eventName ?artistName ?text ?url
WHERE {
    BIND ({event} AS ?event)
    BIND ({musicgroup} AS ?artist)
    ?annotation a oa:Annotation ;
           dct:subject ex:CareerMilestones ;
           oa:hasTarget ?artist ;
           oa:hasBody ?fundraising .
    ?fundraising schema:citation ?url .
    ?fundraising schema:description ?text .
    ?event schema:name ?eventName .
    ?artist schema:name ?artistName .
}
CQ-E27.question: What creative milestones defined [MusicGroup]’s career before and after [Event]?
CQ-E27.answer: [MusicGroup] achieved major milestones before and after [Event], such as [Work1] in [Year1] and [Work2] in [Year2].

CQ-L6.text:
How many satellites were used during [Event]’s broadcast?
[Beat] ['Context Setup', 'Historical Hook']
CQ-L6.sparql:
PREFIX schema: <http://schema.org/>
PREFIX ex: <http://wembrewind.live/ex#>
SELECT ?eventName ?satelliteNetworkDescription (SUM(?count) AS ?totalSatellites)
WHERE {
    BIND(  {event} AS ?event)
    ?event schema:name ?eventName .
    ?broadcast a schema:BroadcastEvent ;
               schema:superEvent ?event ;
               ex:facilitatedBy ?satelliteNetwork .
    ?satelliteNetwork schema:hasPart ?fleet .
    ?satelliteNetwork schema:description ?satelliteNetworkDescription .
    ?fleet schema:numberOfItems ?count .
}
GROUP BY ?eventName ?broadcast ?satelliteNetworkDescription
CQ-L6.question: How many satellites were used during [Event]’s broadcast?

CQ-L7.question: What was the global TV audience size for [Event]?
CQ-L7.answer: [Event] was watched by an estimated [Viewers] people worldwide.

CQ-L10.text:
What was [MusicGroup]’s full setlist at [Event]?
[Beat] ['Performance Detail', 'Cultural Impact', 'Behind the Scenes']
CQ-L10.sparql:
PREFIX ex: <http://wembrewind.live/ex#>
PREFIX mm: <https://w3id.org/polifonia/ontology/music-meta/>
PREFIX schema: <http://schema.org/>
SELECT ?eventName ?artistName ?song ?position
WHERE {
    BIND ({event} AS ?event)
    BIND ({musicgroup} AS ?artist)
  ?performance a mm:LivePerformance ;
               schema:performer   ?artist ;
               schema:isPartOf   ?event ;
               ex:setList ?setlist .
  ?setlist schema:itemListElement ?listItem .
  ?listItem schema:item ?work .
  ?listItem schema:position ?position .
  ?work schema:name ?song .
  ?artist schema:name ?artistName .
  ?event schema:name ?eventName .
}
ORDER BY ?position
CQ-L10.question: What was [MusicGroup]’s full setlist at [Event]?
CQ-L10.answer: [MusicGroup] performed a [Number]-song setlist at [Event], including [Song1], [Song2], and [Song3].

CQ-L11.text:
Which [MusicGroup] song was the third in their [Event] setlist

CQ-L11.sparql:
PREFIX ex: <http://wembrewind.live/ex#>
PREFIX mm: <https://w3id.org/polifonia/ontology/music-meta/>
PREFIX schema: <http://schema.org/>
SELECT ?eventName ?artistName ?song ?position
WHERE {
    BIND ({event} AS ?event)
    BIND ({musicgroup} AS ?artist)
    BIND (3 AS ?position)
  ?performance a mm:LivePerformance ;
               schema:performer   ?artist ;
               schema:isPartOf   ?event ;
               ex:setList ?setlist .
  ?setlist schema:itemListElement ?listItem .
  ?listItem schema:item ?work .
  ?listItem schema:position ?position .
  ?work schema:name ?song .
  ?artist schema:name ?artistName .
  ?event schema:name ?eventName .
}
ORDER BY ?position
CQ-L11.question: Which [MusicGroup] song was the third in their [Event] setlist
CQ-L11.answer: [Song] was the third track performed by [MusicGroup] during their set at [Event].

CQ-L15.text:

CQ-L15.sparql:
PREFIX schema: <http://schema.org/>
PREFIX ex: <http://wembrewind.live/ex#>
PREFIX mm: <https://w3id.org/polifonia/ontology/music-meta/>
SELECT ?artistName (GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT ?genreName; separator=", ") AS ?earlyMusicInfluenceGenre)
WHERE {
    BIND(  {musicgroup} as ?artist)
  ?artist schema:name ?artistName .
  ?artist mm:hasGenre ?genre .
  ?genre schema:name ?genreName .
}
GROUP BY ?artistName
CQ-L15.question: What genre influenced [MusicGroup]’s music?

CQ-L20.text:
How many viewers watched [Event] globally?

CQ-L20.sparql:
PREFIX ex: <http://wembrewind.live/ex#>
PREFIX schema: <http://schema.org/>
PREFIX mm: <https://w3id.org/polifonia/ontology/music-meta/>
PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
SELECT ?eventName ?audienceType ?viewerCount ?countryCount
WHERE {
    BIND(  {event} as ?event)
    ?event ex:hadBroadcast ?broadcast .
    ?event schema:name ?eventName .
    ?broadcast schema:audience ?audience .
    ?audience schema:audienceType ?audienceType .
    ?audience ex:countryCount ?countryCount .
    ?audience ex:viewerCount ?viewerCount .
}
CQ-L20.question: How many viewers watched [Event] globally?
CQ-L20.answer: [Event] reached an estimated global audience of [ViewerCount] across more than [CountryCount] countries.

CQ-L21.text:
What facilitated the simultaneous global broadcast of [Event]?

CQ-L21.sparql:
PREFIX ex: <http://wembrewind.live/ex#>
PREFIX schema: <http://schema.org/>
PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
PREFIX skos: <http://www.w3.org/2004/02/skos/core#>
PREFIX oa: <http://www.w3.org/ns/oa#>
PREFIX dct: <http://purl.org/dc/terms/>
SELECT ?eventName ?text ?url
WHERE {
    BIND ({event} AS ?event)
    ?annotation a oa:Annotation ;
           dct:subject ex:Satellite ;
           oa:hasTarget ?event ;
           oa:hasBody ?satellite .
    ?satellite schema:citation ?url .
    ?satellite schema:description ?text .
    ?event schema:name ?eventName .
}
CQ-L21.question: What facilitated the simultaneous global broadcast of [Event]?
CQ-L21.answer: [Event] was broadcast simultaneously via satellite uplinks and coordinated scheduling between [Venue1] and [Venue2].

How were performance scheduled across the venues during [Event]?

CQ-L22.sparql:
PREFIX ex: <http://wembrewind.live/ex#>
PREFIX schema: <http://schema.org/>
PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
PREFIX skos: <http://www.w3.org/2004/02/skos/core#>
PREFIX oa: <http://www.w3.org/ns/oa#>
PREFIX dct: <http://purl.org/dc/terms/>
SELECT ?eventName ?text ?url
WHERE {
    BIND ({event} AS ?event)
    ?annotation a oa:Annotation ;
           dct:subject ex:Performances ;
           oa:hasTarget ?event ;
           oa:hasBody ?performances .
    ?performances schema:citation ?url .
    ?performances schema:description ?text .
    ?event schema:name ?eventName .
}
CQ-L22.question: How were performance scheduled across the venues during [Event]?
CQ-L22.answer: Performances at [Event] alternated between [Venue1] and [Venue2] to maintain global continuity and maximize coverage.

sparqls:
PREFIX ex: <http://wembrewind.live/ex#>
PREFIX schema: <http://schema.org/>
PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
PREFIX skos: <http://www.w3.org/2004/02/skos/core#>
PREFIX oa: <http://www.w3.org/ns/oa#>
PREFIX dct: <http://purl.org/dc/terms/>
SELECT ?eventName ?text ?url
WHERE {
    BIND ({event} AS ?event)
    ?annotation a oa:Annotation ;
           dct:subject ex:Background ;
           oa:hasTarget ?event ;
           oa:hasBody ?background .
    ?background schema:citation ?url .
    ?background schema:description ?text .
    ?event schema:name ?eventName .
}

PREFIX ex: <http://wembrewind.live/ex#>
PREFIX schema: <http://schema.org/>
PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
PREFIX skos: <http://www.w3.org/2004/02/skos/core#>
PREFIX oa: <http://www.w3.org/ns/oa#>
PREFIX dct: <http://purl.org/dc/terms/>
SELECT ?eventName ?text ?url
WHERE {
    BIND ({event} AS ?event)
    ?annotation a oa:Annotation ;
           dct:subject ex:Background ;
           oa:hasTarget ?event ;
           oa:hasBody ?background .
    ?background schema:citation ?url .
    ?background schema:description ?text .
    ?event schema:name ?eventName .
}

PREFIX ex: <http://wembrewind.live/ex#>
PREFIX schema: <http://schema.org/>
PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
PREFIX skos: <http://www.w3.org/2004/02/skos/core#>
PREFIX oa: <http://www.w3.org/ns/oa#>
PREFIX dct: <http://purl.org/dc/terms/>
SELECT ?eventName ?url
WHERE {
    BIND ({event} AS ?event)
    ?annotation a oa:Annotation ;
           dct:subject ex:Performances ;
           oa:hasTarget ?event ;
           oa:hasBody ?background .
    ?background schema:citation ?url .
    ?event schema:name ?eventName .
}

PREFIX ex: <http://wembrewind.live/ex#>
PREFIX schema: <http://schema.org/>
PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
PREFIX skos: <http://www.w3.org/2004/02/skos/core#>
PREFIX oa: <http://www.w3.org/ns/oa#>
PREFIX dct: <http://purl.org/dc/terms/>
SELECT ?eventName ?text ?url
WHERE {
    BIND ({event} AS ?event)
    ?annotation a oa:Annotation ;
           dct:subject ex:Broadcasts ;
           oa:hasTarget ?event ;
           oa:hasBody ?broadcast .
    ?broadcast schema:citation ?url .
    ?broadcast schema:description ?text .
    ?event schema:name ?eventName .
}

PREFIX ex: <http://wembrewind.live/ex#>
PREFIX schema: <http://schema.org/>
PREFIX mm: <https://w3id.org/polifonia/ontology/music-meta/>
SELECT (GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT ?workName; separator=", ") AS ?allWorkName)
WHERE {
    ?performance a mm:LivePerformance ;
                 schema:isPartOf ?event ;
    			 ex:isIconic ?isIconic .
    ?performance mm:performedWork ?work .
    ?performance schema:performer ?artist .
    ?work schema:name ?workName .
    FILTER(?event =   {event})
    FILTER(?artist = {musicgroup})
}

PREFIX ex: <http://wembrewind.live/ex#>
PREFIX schema: <http://schema.org/>
PREFIX mm: <https://w3id.org/polifonia/ontology/music-meta/>
SELECT ?artistName ?foundingDate ?foundingLocation
WHERE {
    BIND ({musicgroup} as ?artist)
    ?artist a mm:MusicArtist .
    ?artist schema:foundingDate ?foundingDate .
    ?artist schema:foundingLocation ?foundingLocation .
    ?artist schema:name ?artistName .
}

PREFIX ex: <http://wembrewind.live/ex#>
PREFIX schema: <http://schema.org/>
PREFIX mm: <https://w3id.org/polifonia/ontology/music-meta/>
SELECT DISTINCT ?eventName (GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT ?artistName; separator=", ") AS ?allPerformingArtists)
WHERE {
    ?performance a schema:Event, mm:LivePerformance ;
           schema:isPartOf ?event ;
           schema:performer ?artist .
    ?event schema:name ?eventName .
    ?artist a schema:Person .
    ?artist schema:name ?artistName .
    FILTER(?event =   {event})
}
GROUP BY ?eventName

PREFIX ex: <http://wembrewind.live/ex#>
PREFIX schema: <http://schema.org/>
PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
PREFIX skos: <http://www.w3.org/2004/02/skos/core#>
PREFIX oa: <http://www.w3.org/ns/oa#>
PREFIX dct: <http://purl.org/dc/terms/>
SELECT ?eventName ?text ?url
WHERE {
    BIND ({event} AS ?event)
    ?annotation a oa:Annotation ;
           dct:subject ex:Broadcasts ;
           oa:hasTarget ?event ;
           oa:hasBody ?broadcast .
    ?broadcast schema:citation ?url .
    ?broadcast schema:description ?text .
    ?event schema:name ?eventName .
}

PREFIX ex: <http://wembrewind.live/ex#>
PREFIX schema: <http://schema.org/>
PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
PREFIX skos: <http://www.w3.org/2004/02/skos/core#>
PREFIX oa: <http://www.w3.org/ns/oa#>
PREFIX dct: <http://purl.org/dc/terms/>
SELECT ?eventName ?challengeText ?challengeUrl
WHERE {
    BIND ({event} AS ?event)
    ?annotation a oa:Annotation ;
           dct:subject ex:Challenge ;
           oa:hasTarget ?event ;
           oa:hasBody ?challenge .
    ?challenge schema:citation ?challengeUrl .
    ?challenge schema:description ?challengeText .
    ?event schema:name ?eventName .
}

PREFIX ex: <http://wembrewind.live/ex#>
PREFIX schema: <http://schema.org/>
PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
PREFIX skos: <http://www.w3.org/2004/02/skos/core#>
PREFIX oa: <http://www.w3.org/ns/oa#>
PREFIX dct: <http://purl.org/dc/terms/>
SELECT ?eventName ?text ?url
WHERE {
    BIND ({event} AS ?event)
    ?annotation a oa:Annotation ;
           dct:subject ex:Legacy ;
           oa:hasTarget ?event ;
           oa:hasBody ?legacy .
    ?legacy schema:citation ?url .
    ?legacy schema:description ?text .
    ?event schema:name ?eventName .
}

PREFIX ex: <http://wembrewind.live/ex#>
PREFIX schema: <http://schema.org/>
PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
PREFIX skos: <http://www.w3.org/2004/02/skos/core#>
PREFIX oa: <http://www.w3.org/ns/oa#>
PREFIX dct: <http://purl.org/dc/terms/>
SELECT ?eventName ?text ?url
WHERE {
    BIND ({event} AS ?event)
    ?annotation a oa:Annotation ;
           dct:subject ex:Fundraising ;
           oa:hasTarget ?event ;
           oa:hasBody ?fundraising .
    ?fundraising schema:citation ?url .
    ?fundraising schema:description ?text .
    ?event schema:name ?eventName .
}

PREFIX ex: <http://wembrewind.live/ex#>
PREFIX schema: <http://schema.org/>
PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
PREFIX mm: <https://w3id.org/polifonia/ontology/music-meta/>
SELECT ?eventName ?subBroadcastDescription ?broadcastCompanyName ?preserved
WHERE {
    BIND (  {event} as ?mainEvent)
    ?mainEvent schema:name ?eventName .
    ?mainEvent ex:hadBroadcast ?mainBroadcast .
    ?mainBroadcast schema:subEvent ?subBroadcast .
    ?subBroadcast schema:description ?subBroadcastDescription .
    ?subBroadcast schema:provider ?broadcastCompany .
    ?subBroadcast ex:wasBroadcastPreserved ?preserved .
    OPTIONAL { ?broadcastCompany schema:name ?broadcastCompanyName }
    OPTIONAL { ?broadcastCompany rdfs:label ?broadcastCompanyName }
    FILTER(?preserved = false)
}
ORDER BY DESC(?preserved)

PREFIX ex: <http://wembrewind.live/ex#>
PREFIX schema: <http://schema.org/>
PREFIX mm: <https://w3id.org/polifonia/ontology/music-meta/>
SELECT ?artistName ?reason ?url
WHERE {
    BIND ({musicgroup} as ?artist)
    BIND ({event} as ?event)
    ?performance a mm:LivePerformance ;
                 schema:isPartOf   ?event ;
                 schema:performer   ?artist .
    ?artist schema:name ?artistName .
    ?review schema:itemReviewed ?performance .
    ?review schema:reviewBody ?reason .
    ?review schema:url ?url .
}

PREFIX ex: <http://wembrewind.live/ex#>
PREFIX schema: <http://schema.org/>
PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
PREFIX skos: <http://www.w3.org/2004/02/skos/core#>
PREFIX oa: <http://www.w3.org/ns/oa#>
PREFIX dct: <http://purl.org/dc/terms/>
SELECT ?eventName ?artistName ?text ?url
WHERE {
    BIND ({event} AS ?event)
    BIND ({musicgroup} AS ?artist)
    ?annotation a oa:Annotation ;
           dct:subject ex:CareerMilestones ;
           oa:hasTarget ?artist ;
           oa:hasBody ?fundraising .
    ?fundraising schema:citation ?url .
    ?fundraising schema:description ?text .
    ?event schema:name ?eventName .
    ?artist schema:name ?artistName .
}

PREFIX schema: <http://schema.org/>
PREFIX ex: <http://wembrewind.live/ex#>
SELECT ?eventName ?satelliteNetworkDescription (SUM(?count) AS ?totalSatellites)
WHERE {
    BIND(  {event} AS ?event)
    ?event schema:name ?eventName .
    ?broadcast a schema:BroadcastEvent ;
               schema:superEvent ?event ;
               ex:facilitatedBy ?satelliteNetwork .
    ?satelliteNetwork schema:hasPart ?fleet .
    ?satelliteNetwork schema:description ?satelliteNetworkDescription .
    ?fleet schema:numberOfItems ?count .
}
GROUP BY ?eventName ?broadcast ?satelliteNetworkDescription

PREFIX schema: <http://schema.org/>
PREFIX ex: <http://wembrewind.live/ex#>
SELECT ?eventName ?date
WHERE {
    BIND(  {event} AS ?event)
    ?event schema:name ?eventName .
    ?event schema:startDate ?date .
}

PREFIX schema: <http://schema.org/>
PREFIX ex: <http://wembrewind.live/ex#>
SELECT ?eventName ?founderName
WHERE {
    BIND(  {event} AS ?event)
    ?event schema:name ?eventName .
    ?event schema:organizer ?founder .
    ?founder schema:name ?founderName .
}

PREFIX ex: <http://wembrewind.live/ex#>
PREFIX mm: <https://w3id.org/polifonia/ontology/music-meta/>
PREFIX schema: <http://schema.org/>
SELECT ?eventName ?artistName ?song ?position
WHERE {
    BIND ({event} AS ?event)
    BIND ({musicgroup} AS ?artist)
  ?performance a mm:LivePerformance ;
               schema:performer   ?artist ;
               schema:isPartOf   ?event ;
               ex:setList ?setlist .
  ?setlist schema:itemListElement ?listItem .
  ?listItem schema:item ?work .
  ?listItem schema:position ?position .
  ?work schema:name ?song .
  ?artist schema:name ?artistName .
  ?event schema:name ?eventName .
}
ORDER BY ?position

PREFIX ex: <http://wembrewind.live/ex#>
PREFIX mm: <https://w3id.org/polifonia/ontology/music-meta/>
PREFIX schema: <http://schema.org/>
SELECT ?eventName ?artistName ?song ?position
WHERE {
    BIND ({event} AS ?event)
    BIND ({musicgroup} AS ?artist)
    BIND (3 AS ?position)
  ?performance a mm:LivePerformance ;
               schema:performer   ?artist ;
               schema:isPartOf   ?event ;
               ex:setList ?setlist .
  ?setlist schema:itemListElement ?listItem .
  ?listItem schema:item ?work .
  ?listItem schema:position ?position .
  ?work schema:name ?song .
  ?artist schema:name ?artistName .
  ?event schema:name ?eventName .
}
ORDER BY ?position

PREFIX schema: <http://schema.org/>
PREFIX ex: <http://wembrewind.live/ex#>
PREFIX mm: <https://w3id.org/polifonia/ontology/music-meta/>
SELECT ?artistName (GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT ?genreName; separator=", ") AS ?earlyMusicInfluenceGenre)
WHERE {
    BIND(  {musicgroup} as ?artist)
  ?artist schema:name ?artistName .
  ?artist mm:hasGenre ?genre .
  ?genre schema:name ?genreName .
}
GROUP BY ?artistName

PREFIX ex: <http://wembrewind.live/ex#>
PREFIX schema: <http://schema.org/>
PREFIX mm: <https://w3id.org/polifonia/ontology/music-meta/>
PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
SELECT ?eventName ?audienceType ?viewerCount ?countryCount
WHERE {
    BIND(  {event} as ?event)
    ?event ex:hadBroadcast ?broadcast .
    ?event schema:name ?eventName .
    ?broadcast schema:audience ?audience .
    ?audience schema:audienceType ?audienceType .
    ?audience ex:countryCount ?countryCount .
    ?audience ex:viewerCount ?viewerCount .
}

PREFIX ex: <http://wembrewind.live/ex#>
PREFIX schema: <http://schema.org/>
PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
PREFIX skos: <http://www.w3.org/2004/02/skos/core#>
PREFIX oa: <http://www.w3.org/ns/oa#>
PREFIX dct: <http://purl.org/dc/terms/>
SELECT ?eventName ?text ?url
WHERE {
    BIND ({event} AS ?event)
    ?annotation a oa:Annotation ;
           dct:subject ex:Satellite ;
           oa:hasTarget ?event ;
           oa:hasBody ?satellite .
    ?satellite schema:citation ?url .
    ?satellite schema:description ?text .
    ?event schema:name ?eventName .
}

PREFIX ex: <http://wembrewind.live/ex#>
PREFIX schema: <http://schema.org/>
PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
PREFIX skos: <http://www.w3.org/2004/02/skos/core#>
PREFIX oa: <http://www.w3.org/ns/oa#>
PREFIX dct: <http://purl.org/dc/terms/>
SELECT ?eventName ?text ?url
WHERE {
    BIND ({event} AS ?event)
    ?annotation a oa:Annotation ;
           dct:subject ex:Performances ;
           oa:hasTarget ?event ;
           oa:hasBody ?performances .
    ?performances schema:citation ?url .
    ?performances schema:description ?text .
    ?event schema:name ?eventName .
}

answers: [Event] was a global benefit concert held to raise funds for humanitarian relief.
[Event] was organized to raise funds for famine relief in Ethiopia.
[Venue] featured performances by artists such as [Artist1], [Artist2], and [Artist3] during [Event].
Artists who performed during [Event] include [Artist1], [Artist2], and [Artist3].
[Event] was hosted in cities such as [City1], [City2], and countries including [Country1], [Country2].
[Event] was hosted at venues such as [Venue1] and [Venue2].
[Event] was broadcast worldwide via television and radio, expanding its global impact.
[Performance] by [MusicGroup] at [Venue] during [Event] is widely considered iconic.
[MusicGroup] performed a medley including [Song1], [Song2], and [Song3] at [Event].
[SingleArtist] debuted in [Year] with a performance or release in [City/Country].
[MusicGroup] was formed in [Year] in [City/Country].
[MusicGroup] included members such as [Member1], [Member2], and [Member3].
Solo artists who performed at [Event] included [Artist1], [Artist2], and [Artist3].
[MusicGroup] is associated with genres such as [Genre1], [Genre2], and [Genre3].
[Event] was broadcast globally via satellite uplinks and international television networks.
Coordinating two venues, artist schedules, and live global broadcasts presented logistical and technical challenges.
[Event] set the standard for global fundraising concerts and inspired events like Live 8 and Global Citizen.
[MusicGroup]’s performance was widely acclaimed by critics and praised by audiences for its energy and charisma.
[Event] raised over $125 million for famine relief efforts.
